scripts.prepare: pip3 install pdm==2.4.2 && pdm install && touch $(pdm run python -c 'import os, pypika; print(os.path.dirname(pypika.__file__))')/py.typed
scripts.format: pdm run python -m isort -rc . && pdm run python -m black -t py38 .
scripts.publish: pdm run python -m twine upload dist/* -u __token__ -p $PYPI_API_TOKEN
